title: Post-Game Lobby doesn't show who is still in the chat room.
body:
^Title

Basically everyone but myself will be grayed out as if they have all left the lobby, but in fact they are still there since they send messages.

Pls save meh Rito Kenobi
Ur mah onleh hop

replies.body:
Hey DominatorV4,

This could be related to a client issue or a connection issue. To address the client solutions, please try repairing your client. If you're unsure how to do so, a step-by-step guide has been linked below!

http://www.wrenchmen.org/resources/knowledgebase/1?view=article
